title: mathaDa baradhEnO
sahitya:
mAtADa bAradEnO mA ramaNanE prIti kolida prANanAtahyoDa nOvandu

caraNam 1

angaLe beLetingaL bisalAgi tOrudE brngadarava kELa bhItiyAgutE
nAtha

caraNam 2

manda mAruta bandu maruLa mADutE nAtha candavuLLa dEha kAnti
bADutE svAmi

caraNam 3

kAma sharavu enna maiyalli tagalidu nAmagiri narahariyE
nyAyavEnO
